entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet build/publish produces RID-specific apps by default #23540
  • dotnet build/publish uses the implicit SDK RID for RID-specific apps by default #23539
  • Silent incorrect behavior when global.json version lacks patch field #23535
  • Renable packaging tests disabled for the helix merge #23533
  • reenable tests blocked by the install script bug #23531
  • .NET 6.0.102 SDK with 5.0.104 runtime, there is an error text if new a 5.0 ProjectTemplate #23526

PullRequests

Created

  • rtm Branding for 6.0.2xx #23538
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1565848 #23536
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23532
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Skip restoring 1.x in Source Build #23534
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix version.details entry for System.Commandline #23519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23504
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.3xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1565704 #23508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove 1.0.5 and 1.1.2 installs from our linux runtimes #23525
    Area-Infrastructure
